agents.name: Foundations ELA Core Agent
agents.description: Core Instruction / ELA — A K–6 English Language Arts experience that integrates decoding, fluency, comprehension, and writing using tiered lesson modules and embedded assessments.

agents.name: Expression Literature Core Agent
agents.description: Core Instruction / ELA — A Grades 6–12 literature-focused curriculum agent emphasizing deep reading, argumentation, and composition across genres and cultures.

agents.name: Conceptual Math Core Agent
agents.description: Core Instruction / Math — A K–8 mathematics program agent that develops numeracy, operations, and problem-solving through conceptual modeling and application-based tasks.

agents.name: Analytic Math Core Agent
agents.description: Core Instruction / Math — A secondary mathematics agent covering Algebra I, Geometry, and Algebra II with integrated performance tasks, real-world data modeling, and collaborative practice.

agents.name: Inquiry Science Core Agent
agents.description: Core Instruction / Science — A Grades 3–8 curriculum agent that delivers NGSS-aligned, inquiry-based science units with simulations, investigations, and embedded literacy supports.

agents.name: Civic Compass Social Studies Agent
agents.description: Core Instruction / Social Studies — A Grades 6–12 humanities agent that supports civic reasoning, historical inquiry, and economic literacy through multimedia, primary sources, and debates.

agents.name: Momentum Skills Practice Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / Math & ELA — A Grades 2–8 adaptive practice agent that reinforces skills through auto-leveled assignments and growth tracking aligned to core instruction.

agents.name: Fluent Reader Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / ELA — A Grades K–3 oral reading fluency agent that listens to students read aloud, offers immediate feedback, and tracks accuracy and pace over time.

agents.name: Accelerate Literacy Intervention Agent
agents.description: Intervention / ELA — A Grades 4–12 reading intervention agent combining adaptive instruction, small group tasks, and fluency loops for struggling readers.

agents.name: Bridge Math Intervention Agent
agents.description: Intervention / Math — A Grades 5–12 math intervention agent that rebuilds foundational understanding using number sense diagnostics, concept mapping, and scaffolded problem solving.

agents.name: Crafted Writing Studio Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / ELA — A Grades 3–12 writing agent offering guided writing assignments, genre scaffolds, real-time feedback, and teacher-configurable rubrics.

agents.name: Insightful Educator Learning Agent
agents.description: Professional Learning / Cross-Subject — A self-paced and coach-supported PD agent for teachers focused on instructional practice, learning science, and implementation readiness.

agents.name: Vision Assessment Dashboard Agent
agents.description: Assessment / All Subjects — An analytics agent that aggregates curriculum-embedded, external (e.g., MAP-style), and observational data into mastery-aligned dashboards and intervention triggers.

agents.name: Early Foundations Skills Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / Early Literacy — A PreK–2 phonological awareness and phonics agent that delivers interactive decoding, rhyming, and sound recognition exercises.

agents.name: Language Bridge Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / Multilingual Learners — A K–12 dual-language agent providing scaffolds, visual aids, and contextual vocabulary for English learners across subjects.

agents.name: Wellbeing Coach Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / SEL — A K–12 socio-emotional learning agent supporting self-regulation, mindfulness, peer empathy, and journaling routines.

agents.name: Inventive STEM Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / STEM — A Grades 4–10 agent offering interdisciplinary project-based learning in science, technology, engineering, and math.

agents.name: Scientific Pathways Agent
agents.description: Core Instruction / High School Science — A modular Grades 9–12 curriculum agent for Biology, Chemistry, and Physics with labs, simulations, and assessments.

agents.name: Career Explorer Agent
agents.description: Supplemental / Career Readiness — A Grades 6–12 agent that explores CTE pathways, builds digital portfolios, and supports postsecondary planning.

agents.name: Intervention Monitor Agent
agents.description: Intervention / MTSS & RTI — Tracks student progress through Tier 1–3 interventions, flags at-risk learners, and integrates IEP data.

agents.name: Guardian Connect Agent
agents.description: Family Engagement / Cross-Subject — A communication agent that generates weekly learning summaries, alerts, and actionable reports for caregivers.
